languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс открывает рот, чтобы что-то сказать, но в итоге лишь озадаченно кивает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс открывает рот, чтобы что-то сказать, но в итоге лишь озадаченно кивает.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix opens his mouth to say something, but in the end, he only nods, puzzlement on his face.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс открывает рот, чтобы что-то сказать, но в итоге лишь озадаченно кивает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix opens his mouth to say something, but in the end, he only nods, puzzlement on his face.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix opens his mouth to say something, but in the end, he only nods, puzzlement on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix opens his mouth to say something, but in the end, he only nods, puzzlement on his face.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix opens his mouth to say something, but in the end, he only nods, puzzlement on his face.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希张开嘴想说些什么，但最后只是点了点头，脸上露出了困惑不解的神情。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix opens his mouth to say something, but in the end, he only nods, puzzlement on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希张开嘴想说些什么，但最后只是点了点头，脸上露出了困惑不解的神情。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix abre la boca para decir algo, pero, al final, se limita a asentir con una expresión confusa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix opens his mouth to say something, but in the end, he only nods, puzzlement on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix abre la boca para decir algo, pero, al final, se limita a asentir con una expresión confusa.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは何か言おうと口を開いたが、結局、困惑した表情でうなずくだけだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix opens his mouth to say something, but in the end, he only nods, puzzlement on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは何か言おうと口を開いたが、結局、困惑した表情でうなずくだけだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix öffnet den Mund, um etwas zu sagen, doch schließlich nickt er nur mit verwunderter Miene.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix opens his mouth to say something, but in the end, he only nods, puzzlement on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix öffnet den Mund, um etwas zu sagen, doch schließlich nickt er nur mit verwunderter Miene.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix ouvre la bouche pour parler, mais finit par simplement hocher la tête, l'air perplexe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix opens his mouth to say something, but in the end, he only nods, puzzlement on his face.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix ouvre la bouche pour parler, mais finit par simplement hocher la tête, l'air perplexe.{/n}
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, bir şey söylemek için ağzını açıyor ama yüzünde şaşkın bir ifadeyle, başıyla onaylamakla yetiniyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix opens his mouth to say something, but in the end, he only nods, puzzlement on his face.{/n}
